description:
It goes without saying that a solid presentation can be the difference between winning a piece of new business, raising that next round of financing, getting that long overdue raise and taking the next step in your career.

The counterintuitive thing is, having high quality ideas and producing results just isn't enough in todays hyper competitive workplace.

I personally can think of very little more frustrating than someone failing because they were unable to present their results in a clear, logical and convincing way.

Furthermore, the amount of times I've seen executives and decisions makers get held up because of design issues, even though they likely know very little about design, it's almost comical.

With the above in mind, how is the modern executive / entrepreneur supposed to get ahead? It's actually fairly simple...

In order to succeed in today's highly competitive, highly technical world, you need to be able to both produce results and present in a compelling way.

Luckily, this course will provide you with everything you need to know to create a logical, professionally designed and most importantly winning presentation that will allow you to spend more time focusing on your work and sharing your ideas with others.

More specifically, this course is going to teach you:

  • How to rebuild a number of real world winning templates
  • How to present any idea in a logical, convincing way
  • How to build a template that you can repurpose for any presentation
  • How to use hotkeys and shortcuts to speed up the time it takes to build a presentation
  • Presentation design best practices
  • How to replicate any presentation

How to use each tool within Keynote to its fullest potential

Even better yet, I guarantee this course will help take your business or job to the next level. I'm able to make this guarentee because I'm going to give you:

  • The exact templates I've used to win over $5 million in business
  • A simple to replicate presentation framework
  • An easily editable, reusable template
  • A modern design philosophy that anyone can replicate
  • And every tip and trick in the book to make presentations faster than anyone you know

When you're done with this course, you'll have everything you need to grow your business, raise that round of financing, win that big pitch, impress your boss and take your professional life to the next level.

REMINDER: This is a risk free purchase with Udemy's 30 day money back guarantee. Just imagine what life would be like if within the next 30 days you had everything you needed to build an unlimited number of winning presentations.

Best,

Alexander French

P.S. Due to the recent launch of this course, the course is currently priced at a discount. I plan to increase the price in the near future so sign up at the current price while you can!
title: Keynote Presentations For Beginners 2016
